description: DMI Service Layer generated event for APC UPS
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APCUPS-MIB::pwrchuteEventError APCUPS-MIB::a9999ErrorTime s EXAMPLE APCUPS-MIB::a9999ErrorStatus i 9999 APCUPS-MIB::a9999ErrorGroupId i 9999 APCUPS-MIB::a9999ErrorInstanceId i 9999 APCUPS-MIB::a9999ComponentId i 9999 APCUPS-MIB::a9999GroupId i 9999 APCUPS-MIB::a9999InstanceId i 9999 APCUPS-MIB::a9999VendorCode1 i 9999 APCUPS-MIB::a9999VendorCode2 i 9999 APCUPS-MIB::a9999VendorText s EXAMPLE APCUPS-MIB::a9999ParentGroupId i 9999 APCUPS-MIB::a9999ParentInstanceId i 9999

description: The Date & Time when the error occured
variables.name: APCUPS-MIB::a9999ErrorTime

description: Group ID of the errorControl Group
variables.name: APCUPS-MIB::a9999ErrorGroupId

description: Instance ID of the errorControl Group
variables.name: APCUPS-MIB::a9999ErrorInstanceId

description: Component ID of the component that caused this error
variables.name: APCUPS-MIB::a9999ComponentId

description: Group ID of the Group that caused this error
variables.name: APCUPS-MIB::a9999GroupId

description: Instance ID of the Group that caused this error
variables.name: APCUPS-MIB::a9999InstanceId

description: Group ID of parent of Group that caused this error
variables.name: APCUPS-MIB::a9999ParentGroupId

description: Instance ID of parent of Group that caused this error
